title: [Our Colorful Place, Entry]
description: Multi-colored rugs and brilliantly hued walls mark the entry into this small, cozy shop.  A multi-colored counter, painted with every color of the rainbow, monopolizes most of the room.  Standing behind the counter, Darirose, the tiny halfling owner, and her night staff await new orders and instructions.
